name: Monster of Alisher
description:
Citizens are asked to stay calm, don't believe gossips and be careful. In a case you have noticed a suspected person you must report about it in the nearest police station... 

Features:
  • ~ 30 minute of gameplay
  • 2  possible endings
  • original art and story
  • live2D animation
Languages: 
  • English
  • Russian
Credits:

Zhilinkova Kseniya - Writing, original story
VK

JackieD03  -  Art, programming, animation , music
Twitter / Deviantart 

Thank Zhilinkov Kirill for the English translation.

This is the first visual novel that I have created. It is simple and short. But I hope you will enjoy it! 
P.S.  Sorry for music.
- JackieD03 I hope you enjoy this story. ;)
Thank you.
